headline.main: WOR DENIES CHARGE BY AMERICA FIRST; Letter Quoted to Prove That Thirty Minutes Was Offered

lead_paragraph: A denial that radio station WOR or the Mutual network had refused radio time to the America First rally next Thursday night at Madison Square Garden was made yesterday by a WOR spokesman, who quoted from a letter in which an America First official admitted the committee's own dilatory tactics had been to blame.
